# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an empty channel description.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Creating a Channel Description

- **init(mChannelLabel:mChannelFlags:mCoordinates:)**: Creates a channel description with a label, flags, and coordinates.

items.description: Creates a channel description with a label, flags, and coordinates.
items.name: init(mChannelLabel:mChannelFlags:mCoordinates:)
